summary: Bobby is a college freshman and as part of a fraternity prank, he poses as Roberta and becomes pledged into a sorority. There he falls madly in love with Diana. As the game escalates, Bobby... See full summary »
cast: Jonathan Silverman|Alyssa Milano|George Newbern|Michele Matheson|Leilani Sarelle|Christine Healy|Jerry Gideon|Jesse Dabson|Moon Unit Zappa|William Frankfather|Patrick Richwood|Michael Berryman|Damon Standifer|James Garfield|Tia Carrere|Deborah Dillon|Kenneth Ivan|Marcy Kaplan|Pamela Winslow Kashani|Enid Kent|Dane Stack|Twink Caplan|Robert Easton|Cory Milano|Crystal Owens|Dan Moriarty|Paul David Moore|David Powledge|Kim Holman|Jami Richards|Christa Griffin|Richard Jiulliana|Kelle Lynn Gintel|Tuc Watkins
title: Un ladrón con faldas
